metadata.synopsis: Jaheira reaction - Tied to LOW_JaheirasHouse_PAD_JaheiraReactions, this is Jaheira reacting to seeing her druid grove.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Enter Jaheira's house- Go down towards her grove, shouldBookmark for the house: larian://bookmark?name=CTY_JaheirasHouse&mod=GustavDev&level=CTY_Main_A&camPos=-198.180267;36.128036;-47.551403&camTarget=-198.939575;35.720970;-47.043709

0.speaker: Jaheira
0.text: The only patch of wilderness this city permits me. There ought to be supplies here to aid us.
